name: Zooted!
description:
Uh oh, my friends are totally zooted!

You and your liberal arts college buds went out for a good time this weekend, but some of them are mad zooted. It's up to you to make sure they get home safely to their dorms (while still having a good time)!

Created by Hyunseok Choi, Daniel Knopf, Zoe Reifel, Molly Sullivan, and Ben Sulzinsky for the GMTK Game Jam 2020
